entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
